p: Previous studies discussed that the efficacy of herbal tea in reducing heat is related to minimizing the effects of oxidative stress in vivo ( He et al., 2009). In this study, we evaluated the DPPH antioxidant activity of plant raw materials with an UV greater than 5 to determine the effect of qīng-căo-chá tea raw materials. However, if the raw materials were included in “Taiwan Herbal Pharmacopoeia,” they were not tested in this experiment.
